text: Yobhanda an'yayi ko hola jasale allahamathi mithya dosaropana garyo, va usaka ayataharula'i galata bhandacha. Tiniharule aphno bhagyale nirdharita gareko kura pa'unechan. Yahamsam'ma ki jaba tiniche'u hamile patha'eka pharistaharu prana nikalna a'une chan ra bhanne chanh ki, allaha baheka jasala'i timile pukarne gardathyau tiniharu ahile kaham ga'e? Tiniharule bhanne chanh (thaha chaina) tiniharule hamila'i chodera ga'ihale ra tiniharule aphula'i kaphira bha'eko kura svikara garnechan
